Flow.description: 12MAY25 - COLIN - Stamping of Closed Owner Role on CW/CL instead of CWP 22APR25 - ARA - Added SSDR to 'XDR Check' 26MAR25 - PAT - Updated the TermLength formula 24MAR25 - COLIN - Removed Onboarding Status field update 20Mar25 - Removed Agency Account Owner? element 12Mar25-Faizan-Updated as part of ESS-1779 11Mar25 - Updated the logic to pull PAM from the Account Owner of the Agency Account and populate their manager in the PAM Manager field 03Mar25 - Added PAM Manager Assignment in Agency Account Owner Decision 28Feb25 - Added Account Tier in the Agency Account Owner Decision Outcome 24Feb25 - Updated Moved From Stage 0 Decision Outcome 20Feb25 - Removed the Closed Won Booking Amount logic 18Dec24 - Update RecordType for HubSpot 12Dec24 - Added check on FTC Check 01AUG24 - DN(ESS) - Added Stage Closed Won Pending Date Time stamp before datacenter validation 14JUN24 - CC(ESS) - Modified FTC logic to be based on WPE Term Type being Standard Fixed Term 12JUN24 - CC(ESS) - Update error wording for FTC 10JUN24 - CC(ESS) - Modified FTC logic to be based on WPE Term Type being Fixed Term 15MAY24 - DON(ESS) - Added custom error for FTC & TOS 10Apr24 - (CS) - Eliminate Stage test from CouponCodeExist test - and don't blank for non O.E. 12May23 - SDA(CC) - update Start Date with Close Date at the end of the flow 14Apr23 - PJ(CC) - Fixed Onboarding Note format 21Feb23 - SA(CC) - Automatic Opp Name update 16Feb23 - SA(CC) - store current related subscription MRR to the current MRR fields in the Opp Recent Changes: Add "-----" to Lead Source Detail 30May23 - Added BAPI Auto Close decision

formulas.name: CloseDateformula
formulas.expression: CASE(WEEKDAY(Today()+15), 1,now()+16, /*Set Sunday to Monday */ 7,now()+17, /*Set Saturday to Monday */ now()+15 )

formulas.name: ForecastStageLogic
formulas.expression:
IF(isnew() && Text({!$Record.StageName}) ="0 - Pre Sales Qualified", "Omitted", If( And( Text({!$Record__Prior.StageName}) ="0 - Pre Sales Qualified", Text({!$Record.Forecast_Stage__c}) <> "Commit", Text({!$Record.Forecast_Stage__c}) <> "Best Case"), Case( Text({!$Record.StageName}), "1 - Discovery", "Pipeline", "2 - Solution Fit", "Pipeline", "3 - Consideration", "Pipeline", "4 - Negotiation", "Pipeline", "5 - Migration", "Pipeline", "Omitted"),
Case( Text({!$Record.StageName}), "Closed Won", "Closed", "Closed Lost", "Omitted", "Disqualified", "Omitted",
"Identified Risk", "Pipeline", "Evaluating Options", "Best Case", "Transitioning", "Commit", "Dev Acct Proposal", "Best Case", "Churned", "Closed", "Saved", "Omitted", "Downgraded", "Closed",
IF ( AND ( {!$Record__Prior.IsClosed} = TRUE, Text( {!$Record.Forecast_Stage__c} ) <> "Closed"), "Omitted", IF ( AND( {!$Record.IsClosed} = False, Text( {!$Record.Forecast_Stage__c} ) = "Closed"), "Omitted", IF ( Text({!$Record.StageName}) ="Closed Won Pending" , "Commit", IF( Text( {!$Record.Forecast_Stage__c} ) <> "", Text( {!$Record.Forecast_Stage__c} ) , "Omitted")))) ) ) )

formulas.name: NewHighestStageNum
formulas.expression: case( {!$Record.StageName}, "0 - Pre Sales Qualified",0, "1 - Discovery",1, "2 - Solution Fit",2, "3 - Consideration",3, "4 - Negotiation",4, "5 - Migration",5, "Qualification",1, "Closed Won",0, "Closed Lost",0, "Disqualified",0, 0)

formulas.name: OnboardingNoteCROSSSELLS
formulas.expression: "Cross-Sell: " & BR() & BR() & "1.) Is the primary customer contact an agency, or a client of an existing agency? " & BR() & BR() & "1a.) What is the primary contact's email address? " & BR() & BR() & "2.) Will this involve the migration of existing WPE sites between separate WPE accounts? " & BR() & BR() & "2a.) Has authorization been provided? (Support Owner PIN) " & BR() & BR() & "3.) What is the preferred datacenter location? " & BR() & BR() & "4.) What is the expected level of customer engagement with Onboarding? " & BR() & BR() & "5.) Do they have any specific technical requirements that were discussed with the SE? " & BR() & BR() & "6.) DNS changes: Do they have all the relevant information to do this? Any special requirements? (i.e. Reverse Proxies, GES/Cloudflare adoption, etc...) " & BR()

formulas.name: OnboardingNoteNEW
formulas.expression: "Net New Deal:" & BR() & BR() & "1.) Who is the primary contact? (email goes here) "& BR() & BR() & "2.) What is the preferred method of contact? "& BR() & BR() & "3.) What is the preferred datacenter location? "& BR() & BR() & "4.) Is the customer a high touch point customer? "& BR() & BR() & "5.) What were their main pain points from their previous provider; what are we trying to solve? "& BR() & BR() & "6.) What performance metrics are they looking for? "& BR() & BR() & "7.) Do they have any really specific technical requirements that were discussed with the SE? "& BR() & BR() & "8.) DNS Changes: Do they have all the relevant information to do this? Any Special Requirements? "& BR()

formulas.name: OnboardingNoteUPGRADE
formulas.expression: "Upgrades: " & BR() & BR() & "1.) Who is the primary contact? (email goes here) " & BR() & BR() & "2.) What is the preferred datacenter location? " & BR() & BR() & "3.) What is the Account Owner’s Support PIN? " & BR() & BR() & "4.) What is the preferred upgrade/migration time? " & BR() & BR() & "5.) Is this a project (if so, for how long) " & BR() & BR() & "6.) What performance metrics are they looking for? " & BR() & BR() & "7.) Do they have any really specific technical requirements that were discussed with the SE? " & BR() & BR() & "8.) DNS Changes: Do they have all the relevant information to do this? Any Special Requirements? (Note - does not apply to in-place upgrades. No DNS updates required for in-place) " & BR()

formulas.name: TermLength
formulas.expression: IF(TEXT({!$Record.WPE_Term_Type__c})<>"Month-to-Month", IF(TEXT({!$Record.Contract_Term__c})= "1 Year", 12, IF(TEXT({!$Record.Contract_Term__c}) = "2 Year", 24, IF(TEXT({!$Record.Contract_Term__c}) = "3 Year", 36, IF(TEXT({!$Record.Contract_Term__c}) = null,null, {!$Record.Term_Length_In_Months__c})))),1)

Flow.label: Opportunity - Before Save

recordLookups.label: Get Record of First Touch SLA

textTemplates.name: tt_OnboardingNoteCROSSSELLS
textTemplates.text: Cross-Sell: 1.) Is the primary customer contact an agency, or a client of an existing agency? 1a.) What is the primary contact's email address? 2.) Will this involve the migration of existing WPE sites between separate WPE accounts? 2a.) Has authorization been provided? (Support Owner PIN) 3.) What is the preferred datacenter location? 4.) What is the expected level of customer engagement with Onboarding? 5.) Do they have any specific technical requirements that were discussed with the SE? 6.) DNS changes: Do they have all the relevant information to do this? Any special requirements? (i.e. Reverse Proxies, GES/Cloudflare adoption, etc...)

textTemplates.name: tt_OnboardingNoteNEW
textTemplates.text: Net New Deal: 1.) Who is the primary contact? (email goes here) 2.) What is the preferred method of contact? 3.) What is the preferred datacenter location? 4.) Is the customer a high touch point customer? 5.) What were their main pain points from their previous provider; what are we trying to solve? 6.) What performance metrics are they looking for? 7.) Do they have any really specific technical requirements that were discussed with the SE? 8.) DNS Changes: Do they have all the relevant information to do this? Any Special Requirements?

textTemplates.name: tt_OnboardingNoteUPGRADE
textTemplates.text: Upgrades: 1.) Who is the primary contact? (email goes here) 2.) What is the preferred datacenter location? 3.) What is the Account Owner’s Support PIN? 4.) What is the preferred upgrade/migration time? 5.) Is this a project (if so, for how long) 6.) What performance metrics are they looking for? 7.) Do they have any really specific technical requirements that were discussed with the SE? 8.) DNS Changes: Do they have all the relevant information to do this? Any Special Requirements? (Note - does not apply to in-place upgrades. No DNS updates required for in-place)
